pages.name: Hint #2
pages.text: Blaze and honey, a fiery brew, in a keg of warmth for the daring few. Find the drink that quickens pace, where lava's glow and sweetness embrace.$(br)$(br)See the next page for the answer.

pages.title: Answer #2
pages.text: Brew an Infernal Mule using a keg. The recipe requires lava, gunpowder, blaze powder, and honey comb.
